context: How durable are the springs?  I owned a couple Flightstick Pros a long time ago and the springs broke after a few months.
response: The springs are pretty durable.  I've been using mine for the last couple of months and I've seen no significant deterioration.

context: if i plug without batteries can i play?

context: are the keys themselves illuminated? does the actual letters light up or is it just backlight around the keys? just making sure

context: What are the teams like? Are there only Test teams, and who are the players?
response: no there are all the teams including ipl nd Australian league as well. you have the option to switch to players nd teams that bradman community has created this way u will get all the real names nd somewhat they look alike real players. Overall its a good cricket game

context: Hi! Before I buy this I would like to know if when you buy this you get it forever or for 1 year because it says you get 12 battlepacks for 12 Months.
response: Sorry for my below response- "Battlepacks" are forever but "premium status" is a year. Within the year you get 12 Battlepacks. Sorry for the error.
